actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish fire safety requirements for locomotives in order too minimize the danger of fires along railroad right-of-ways.

summary.text: Railroad Right-of-Way Fire Prevention Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation, under the Federal Railroad Safety Act, to establish fire Safety requirements for locomotives to minimize the danger of fires along railroad rights-of-way. (Amends 45 U.S.C. 431-441)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish fire safety requirements for locomotives in order too minimize the danger of fires along railroad right-of-ways.
